#summary Development in Windows

= Introduction =

This document is for developers only. It describes how to configure Windows as development platform and how to compile delaboratory.

= Install MinGW =

http://sourceforge.net/projects/mingw/files/

Download mingw-get-inst-20120426.exe (662.7 kB) 

C++ compiler
MSYS Basic System
MinGW Deveoper Toolkit

after installation run msys in directory MinGW -> msys -> 1.0

= libtiff =

download http://download.osgeo.org/libtiff/tiff-4.0.3.tar.gz

copy into home folder in msys

tar zxvf tiff-4.0.3.tar.gz, cd, configure, make, make install


= Compiling wxWidgets with MinGW =

wxWidgets 2.8 doesn't work/compile
wxWidgets 2.9.4 compiles OK, remember to tell configure to use static
